com.star.reportng
类 ReportNGUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.star.reportng.ReportNGUtils

public class ReportNGUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that provides various helper methods that can be invoked from a Velocity template.

作者：
Daniel Dyer

方法详细信息

getDuration

public long getDuration(org.testng.ITestContext context)
Returns the aggregate of the elapsed times for each test result.

参数：
context - The test results.
返回：
The sum of the test durations.

getDuration

private long getDuration(java.util.Set<org.testng.ITestResult> results)
Returns the aggregate of the elapsed times for each test result.

参数：
results - A set of test results.
返回：
The sum of the test durations.

                                       long endMillis)

formatDuration

public java.lang.String formatDuration(long elapsed)

getCauses

public java.util.List<java.lang.Throwable> getCauses(java.lang.Throwable t)
Convert a Throwable into a list containing all of its causes.

参数：
t - The throwable for which the causes are to be returned.
返回：
A (possibly empty) list of Throwables.

getTestOutput

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTestOutput(org.testng.ITestResult result)
Retrieves all log messages associated with a particular test result.

参数：
result - Which test result to look-up.
返回：
A list of log messages.

getAllOutput

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllOutput()
Retieves the output from all calls to Reporter.log(String) across all tests.

返回：
A (possibly empty) list of log messages.

hasArguments

public boolean hasArguments(org.testng.ITestResult result)

getArguments

public java.lang.String getArguments(org.testng.ITestResult result)

renderArgument

private java.lang.String renderArgument(java.lang.Object argument)
Decorate the string representation of an argument to give some hint as to its type (e.g. render Strings in double quotes).

参数：
argument - The argument to render.
返回：
The string representation of the argument.

hasDependentGroups

public boolean hasDependentGroups(org.testng.ITestResult result)
参数：
result - The test result to be checked for dependent groups.
返回：
True if this test was dependent on any groups, false otherwise.

getDependentGroups

public java.lang.String getDependentGroups(org.testng.ITestResult result)
返回：
A comma-separated string listing all dependent groups. Returns an empty string it there are no dependent groups.

hasDependentMethods

public boolean hasDependentMethods(org.testng.ITestResult result)
参数：
result - The test result to be checked for dependent methods.
返回：
True if this test was dependent on any methods, false otherwise.

getDependentMethods

public java.lang.String getDependentMethods(org.testng.ITestResult result)
返回：
A comma-separated string listing all dependent methods. Returns an empty string it there are no dependent methods.

hasGroups

public boolean hasGroups(org.testng.ISuite suite)

commaSeparate

private java.lang.String commaSeparate(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> strings)
Takes a list of Strings and combines them into a single comma-separated String.

参数：
strings - The Strings to combine.
返回：
The combined, comma-separated, String.

escapeString

public java.lang.String escapeString(java.lang.String s)
Replace any angle brackets, quotes, apostrophes or ampersands with the corresponding XML/HTML entities to avoid problems displaying the String in an XML document. Assumes that the String does not already contain any entities (otherwise the ampersands will be escaped again).

参数：
s - The String to escape.
返回：
The escaped String.

escapeChar

private java.lang.String escapeChar(char character)
Converts a char into a String that can be inserted into an XML document, replacing special characters with XML entities as required.

参数：
character - The character to convert.
返回：
An XML entity representing the character (or a String containing just the character if it does not need to be escaped).

escapeHTMLString

public java.lang.String escapeHTMLString(java.lang.String s)
Works like escapeString(String) but also replaces line breaks with <br /> tags and preserves significant whitespace.

参数：
s - The String to escape.
返回：
The escaped String.

stripThreadName

public java.lang.String stripThreadName(java.lang.String threadId)
TestNG returns a compound thread ID that includes the thread name and its numeric ID, separated by an 'at' sign. We only want to use the thread name as the ID is mostly unimportant and it takes up too much space in the generated report.

参数：
threadId - The compound thread ID.
返回：
The thread name.

getStartTime

public long getStartTime(java.util.List<org.testng.ITestNGMethod> methods)
Find the earliest start time of the specified methods.

参数：
methods - A list of test methods.
返回：
The earliest start time.

getEndTime

public long getEndTime(org.testng.ISuite suite,
                       org.testng.ITestNGMethod method,
                       java.util.List<org.testng.ITestNGMethod> methods)

getEndTime

private long getEndTime(org.testng.ISuite suite,
                        org.testng.ITestNGMethod method)
Returns the timestamp for the time at which the suite finished executing. This is determined by finding the latest end time for each of the individual tests in the suite.

参数：
suite - The suite to find the end time of.
返回：
The end time (as a number of milliseconds since 00:00 1st January 1970 UTC).
